another method that's super interesting
to learn is called c method and it was
created by kevin horsley he's actually
one of a few people in the world to have
received the title international grand
master of memory he's also the guy who
memorized 10 000 digits of pie you might
think he had good memory but in reality
he was dyslexic and struggled to

memory where he revealed his c method
the first letter stands for sense the
second exaggerate the third energize so
basically when you remember a word you
use your senses sight hearing smell
taste and touch you imagine what it
would look like you imagine how it would
feel to touch and taste then you
exaggerate it make it stand out in your
mind and then you energize and put
